content.query:
create schema gold
--drop view gold.final
create view gold.final 
as SELECT
     *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://olistdheeraj.dfs.core.windows.net/olistdata/silver/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS result1
    where order_status='delivered'
    select * from gold.final
